item.title: Version 1.1.12
item.description:
This release supports Asynchronous Reprojection with Revive if you use the SteamVR Beta, so you can turn it back on.

Changes

  • Fixed stuttering when using Asynchronous Reprojection (requires SteamVR Beta)

Bug fixes

  • Fixed Showdown not starting correctly from the dashboard (#707)
  • Fixed Revive not loading correctly due to a hard dependency on Vulkan (#702)
